item.title: Sega Lunar Sale 2026 Offers Up To 80% Off Games—What Games Are Included?

item.title: Does God of War Sons of Sparta Have Co-op or Multiplayer?
item.content:encoded:
The confusion surrounding co-op and/or multiplayer being present in God of War Sons of Sparta at launch was so big that it threatened to consume Olympus itself. If you’re also wondering the same thing, we’ve got the latest on the co-op controversy.

The God of War games have always been without co-op or multiplayer—apart from Ascension’s additional multiplayer add-on. Traditionally, every Greek and Norse tale has revolved around our sometimes bearded, sometimes goatee’d God of War on his lonesome.

Sons of Sparta‘s marketing and advertising have made everyone think twice, though.

Can You Play God of War Sons of Sparta in Co-op or Multiplayer?

Officially, there seems to be no way to play God of War Sons of Sparta with another player in co-op or multiplayer, and it’s unclear if this is an accident or a bug.

Firstly, the reveal trailer only showed Kratos battling alone; no second person was controlling Deimos. Which begs the question: Why do people think Sons of Sparta has local or some sort of online co-op multiplayer (there’s 100% no competitive multiplayer, that’s for sure)?

  • More Insider Gaming: Complete God of War Sons of Sparta Trophy List

The official PlayStation Store listing for God of War Sons of Sparta CLEARLY states that up to “1-2 players” can enjoy the game in “Offline play.”

Again, just to reiterate, there is no online component.

If you check Reddit, X, and various forms of social media, you’ll see that many players have bought Sons of Sparta on the pretense that the 2026 God of War title has co-op integration.

Insider Gaming has done some testing and tinkering, and there is simply no way to play co-op in Sons of Sparta so far.

Leaving us to assume one of three things:

  • God of War Sons of Sparta NEVER had co-op, and it’s a miscommunication issue falsely letting consumers believe it’s the case.
  • God of War Sons of Sparta DOES have co-op, but it’s currently bugged and not working as intended.
  • God of War Sons of Sparta DOES have co-op, but you need to unlock it somehow.

Realistically, the most likely outcome is the first explanation.

Will God of War Sons of Sparta Ever Get Co-op or Multiplayer?

Unfortunately, your guess is as good as anyone’s, as neither PlayStation nor Santa Monica has commented on the co-op confusion, at the time of writing.

You’d think something this big would’ve been addressed quite quickly if it were a simple bug. More than likely, it’s a misunderstanding, and the game was not intended to have co-op.

  • More Insider Gaming: All God of War Sons of Sparta Platforms, Explained

That’s not to say Sons of Sparta won’t get a co-op mode in the future, and maybe it’s even being worked on behind the scenes. You’ll have to enjoy GOW Sons of Sparta as a single-player title until any announcement or confirmation.

Insider Gaming is where you’ll be able to find breaking news on Sons of Sparta. There’s also the Insider Gaming Discord Server if you want to talk about the co-op controversy, or if you’ve managed to have any luck with co-op in the game.

For more questions and answers, check out if God of War Sons of Sparta has a Physical Edition and how much the game costs.

item.title: Kingdom Come Deliverance Enhanced Update Now Available
item.content:encoded:
The Enhanced Version of Kingdom Come Deliverance for PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S has been released.

Kingdom Come: Deliverance’s enhanced update was leaked early last month via a PlayStation Store listing that revealed some of the features we can expect. It was also claimed that the update would arrive in early 2026, and the developers have confirmed this, along with a brand-new trailer.

Kingdom Come Deliverance Enhanced Update Shadow Dropped Today for PS5 and Xbox

As revealed in the press release, the Kingdom Come Deliverance Enhanced Update is available today on PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series X/S. What’s more, players that owned the PlayStation 4 and Xbox One versions can grab the update for free. The update is a reward to players as part of Kingdom Come Deliverance 2’s Anniversary Celebrations.

The PS5 and Xbox Series X/S update for Kingdom Come Deliverance provides players with 60 FPS, quality settings, and improved visual assets. The update is delivered by Warhorse Studios and Deep Silver, in collaboration with Saber Interactive. Interested readers can check out the new trailer below:

Kingdom Come Deliverance 2 Sells 5 Million Copies

Moreover, Warhorse Studios and Deep Silver announced a new milestone for Kingdom Come Deliverance 2, selling 5 million copies in the first year. Additionally, as part of the anniversary celebrations, players will get a personalized infographic documenting their stories adventuring through Bohemia.

The Kingdom Come: Deliverance Enhanced Update is available to download now, free for existing users, and can be purchased on the PlayStation and Xbox digital stores. The title with the next-gen update is also available to play for all Game Pass subscribers.

In other news, the creative director of Kingdom Come: Deliverance 2 has said that AI isn’t going anywhere soon. Will you be trying out Kingdom Come Deliverance’s Enhanced Update today? Leave your thoughts down in the comments, and join the official Insider Gaming Discord server.
